title: Personal Information Protection
context: CHAPTER 487J PERSONAL INFORMATION PROTECTION Section 487J-1 Definitions 487J-2 Social security number protection 487J-3 Penalties; civil action 487J-4 Reporting requirements 487J-5 Policy and oversight responsibility 487J-6 Unlawful use of identification card or driver&rsquo;s license 487J-7 Pharmacy benefit managers; health information; prohibited marketing practices Note Chapter heading amended by L 2012, c 191, §3.
